# [Interview #75: ACOS Signing Report - Erica Sadun, Entry #17](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=75#17)

#### Question

And for fun ask whether Ogier can be Friends of the Dark.

#### Robert Jordan

[strange look] RAFO.

#### Footnote

RJ said
[elsewhere](http://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=142#5)
that they can.
